response.overview: In this social realist film, Lee, a talented street artist, forms an unlikely friendship with Lisa, a compassionate woman working at a food bank. Their lives intertwine when Lee encounters Richard, an upper-class man who takes a genuine interest in one of Leeâ€™s paintings. However, fate deals a cruel blow to Richard as he loses his job on the same day. Weeks later, Richard finds himself at the food bank, where he reunites with Lee. A profound connection forms between them, leading Lee to gift Richard the cherished painting. In return, Richard offers Lee his phone to reconnect with his long-lost family
response.title: Lee
